Description:
Prestigious Family Living
Set in the most popular Estate in Craigieburn, everything you want is here! Attention to detail, overall quality and workmanship is what makes this brand new home a potential reality!
If you're a first home buyer looking for that something special or an astute buyer/investor wanting a home that's a cut above the rest, than look no further!
With a spacious entry/hallway, three accommodating bedrooms all with built in robes and master with walk in robe and ensuite. An open plan living area with a stunning kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, stone bench tops, adjoining meals area overlooking to your low maintenance rear yard is exactly what you all have been waiting for!
Some of the upgraded features include heating, cooling, high ceilings, study nook and much much more.
This is a rare opportunity dont miss out!
Call Eddi Bagdadi for more information
Insights: 7 Angophora Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful and Charming!!!
Townhouse Living takes the appeal of city life and enhances it with the best of suburban living. Right at the heart of Craigieburn this newly built two bedroom property sets in a prime location.
Boasting two bedrooms serviced by a splendid bath with two way access, Well appointed Modern Kitchen with Meals, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. A stunning bathroom, powder room, two Split Systems downstairs and upstairs, Laundry, Ample Storage, Sunny Courtyard, rear access through the single Carport with roller door.
Loaded with appeal this neat and tidy townhouse offers ease and comfort, meets all the key criteria and sits within close proximity to Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Centre, Highland Hotel, Schools, Public Transport, Local Shops, Caffe, Parks & Reserves and easy commute to Melbourne CBD.
Call Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397 today to book your inspection!
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only and all photos are for illustration purposes only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent

Description:
POSITION & POTENTIAL
If youre considering upsizing, downsizing, buying your first home or simply want to secure an investment in Craigieburn with a large allotment- this stunning three bedroom residence has got you covered. Situated on a generous allotment of approx. 784m2 with plenty of scope to update or extend (STCA) there is much to work with. This beautiful semi-renovated, light filled family home comprises of 3 generous sized bedrooms with BIR, and master with ensuite and WIR, kitchen with ample storage, meals area and a separate large, family area with cathedral ceilings. Centrally located and minutes away to all forms of amenities including: Schools, Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn train station and other forms of public transport.
Extras include: black butt timber flooring, large undercover entertainment area, double garage, solar electricity, large rear private garden with a vegetable garden and plenty of room for the family and kids, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a large shed out the back.
If its position and value you are looking for, then this is a must see!
Insights: 5 Kelsey Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
When Location, Style & Affordability Meet
Designed for easy living this low maintenance residence will be sure to impress with its impeccable presentation, central location and its list of extras. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or adding to your investment portfolio this home deserves your attention.
Comprising 3 bedrooms with BIRs, sparkling central bathroom, full size laundry, gourmet kitchen with an abundance of storage and bench space overlooking a sun-drenched meals and family area leading out to a lovely rear yard.
Including ducted heating, semi-enclosed carport, roller blinds, landscaped gardens, freshly painted and new carpet are just some of inclusions this stylish abode has to offer.
Perfectly located next to the very best of what Craigieburn has to offer including local shops, Mt Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, child care facilities, public transport, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Splash Aqua Park and easy access to Craigieburn Bypass and Hume Fwy.
Contact: Domenic Campisi - 0412 777 372
https://www.facebook.com/domeniccampisirealestate/

Description:
The Perfect Family Paradise
Boasting lavish family living and overloaded with upgrades, this quality family home awaits one lucky purchaser! Comprising of four generous size bedrooms (3 with built in robes- master with en suite and WIR) spacious formal living zone/theatre room and an open plan family/kitchen/meals arrangement.
The heart of the home features an oversized hostess kitchen fitted with 40mm stone bench tops, ample cupboard space, stainless steel appliances and a generous size butlers pantry. A super list of extras include evaporative cooling and ducted heating, high ceilings, security alarm, security cameras, wood fire heater, alfresco area, low maintenance gardens, wood fire pizza oven, garden shed, double car garage and side gate access.
Only a stones throw away to all your close amenities such as schools, parklands, Craigieburn central and transportation.
Dont miss out and inspect today as surely this paradise will not be around for long.
Start the housewarming invitations now and move into your new home tomorrow.
YPA Craigieburn exclusively welcomes you and looks forward to meeting you at the open homes.
Insights: 41 Brentwick Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Low Maintenance Living in the Heart of Craigieburn
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its low maintenance living & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this is a must see!

Perfectly located within walking distance to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highland Hotel, Perisher Reserve, Golden Sun Moth Park, sporting facilities, schools, public transport & more. An opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
COMFORT, STYLE & AFFORDABILITY
Comfort, style and affordability is whats on offer when you enter this much loved family home. Offering three very well proportioned bedrooms all with built in robes plus ensuite to the master bedroom, a central bathroom, and accommodating laundry with external access. The central hub of the home offers a very spacious open concept family and living zone, kitchen and meals area with plenty of natural light coming through the expansive decked alfresco area that allows for indoor outdoor dining and entertaining that also lead out to a generous size backyard. This home also provides the flexibility of a second living area, possible home office or optional 4th bedroom should it be required. Located within close proximity to Craigieburn Shopping, local amenities and established schools this home is ideally suited for the first home buyer or astute investor. Definitely a must see property.

Description:
Stylish Double Story Family Home in Premium Location
This quality build family home is designed to live, entertain and enjoy a unique lifestyle with family and friends for years to come, combining modern free flowing floorplan and unparalleled quality showcasing commanding street presence.
Sitting amongst the finest neighbourhood in a very sought after location close to water ways, short stroll to Craigieburn central, local schools, well maintained park lands, health & leisure centres and public transport, This is the perfect home where you want to grow your family.
The notable features are
- Large double story home on approx. 435 sq. m land
- 4 bedrooms plus study makes it ideal for a large family.
- Spacious kitchen with walk in pantry and 900mm SS appliances
- Luxury master suite with His and Her walk in robes
- Decked grand alfresco and well-built barbeque arena
- Evaporative cooling & ducted heating
- High ceilings and plantation shutters throughout
- Remote operated double garage.
- Spacious low maintenance backyard. Let your kids & pets run freely in the safety of your backyard.
Inspection is must. Call today.

Description:
Affordable Luxury With Parkland At Your Door
Offering a perfect balance of space, style and convenience, this radiant three bedroom townhouse delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets. This impressive residence features a light and bright open-plan living area, where a central modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances with stone benches and dishwasher is flanked by an inviting living space and sun-kissed dining area, which integrates with the private and low maintenance large backyard.
A key feature of this move-straight-into residence is the intelligent zoning of both spacious bedrooms upstairs; the master complete with built in mirrored robes & ensuite with its very own balcony looking over the park, striking main bathroom and bedrooms with built in robes.
Enhancing this property's indisputable appeal is heating & cooling, a remote double carport accessed via the backyard, three toilets and all located in one of Craigieburn's best estates.

Description:
listedAS MODERN HOME WITH GREAT BACKYARD
Situated close to Highlands shopping centre, this modern home is a perfect opportunity to acquire an ideal first home or to downsize without any compromise
The modern façade of this beautiful home takes you to:
Three generous size bedrooms, master with walk in robe and double vanity en-suite, all remaining bedrooms offer built in robes
The open plan kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, glass splashback, 900mm all-in-one cook top, quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher will just impress the chef at heart
Large open plan meals & family area with stylish flooring
Open the sliding doors to the alfresco with quality decking for your perfect family entertainment
Professionally landscaped large backyard is perfect for a family with kids and pets
Extras include evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, double car garage, large fridge space, abundance of storage, downlights, imposing and welcoming façade, high ceilings.
Located so close to all local amenities including Hume freeway, shopping Centre, public transport this home tick all the right boxes
Avoid disappointment and please call Sabby Singh for an inspection today!
(Photo ID is required at all open for inspections)

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy
Ideal for first home buyers and those wanting to upgrader.
The location adds to the pleasure of living here as it is located in one of Craigieburn's most sought after pockets. Situated within close distance to Craigieburn Central, public transport, local schools and shops, sporting facilities and much more! You really do have everything at your fingertips. With features on hand such as separate formal lounge, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, meals and family area, enclosed alfresco, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double garage with remote control and much more. Inspection will not disappoint, be quick to see this one before you miss out!!

Description:
Winner For a Beginner!
This beautifully presented family home situated in the highly sought after Highlands Estate will be sure to impress all. This modern Henley home is great for first home buyers, down-sizers and investors. Comprising of 3 great size bedrooms including master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, generously sized kitchen with massive walk in pantry featuring stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, open plan meals and family area, well maintained backyard, with other features comprising of, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, downlights, garage with remote control. Within walking distance to Newbury Primary, child care facilities and within close proximity Hume Anglican grammar and other local amenities including Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, parklands, public transport, this home is very centrally located. Inspections will not disappoint!
